name: rishivarma853-user-mngmnt-first-express-ejs-web-app
description: This is an Online User Management System where an Admin can View all the Users, Add a new User, View the details of a User, Edit details of a User and Delete an User. This is a Full Stack Web Application built using EJS Templating Language, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, TypeScript.
author: Rishi Varma Kalidindi
